title: Satellite image shows impact of US-Israel strike on Iran Supreme Leader Khamenei's palace
content: Several key structures within the compound, long used as Khamenei's primary official residence and a central hub for leadership functions, appear obliterated or severely compromised. Iran struck American military bases across the Middle East in retaliatory strikes against Israel and the United States, hours after the two arch-rivals rocked Tehran Saturday morning.

title: Bored of Peace? Half of Donald Trump's Board of Peace is at war
content: Donald Trump‚Äôs grandly titled Board of Peace was supposed to be a Trumpian alternative to the United Nations, promising order, stability, and the end of endless wars. Instead, it resembles a Yes Minister casting call where the least qualified are handed the grandest titles. Nearly half its members are now entangled in active military escalation, from US-Israel strikes on Iran to Pakistan‚Äôs growing confrontation with the Taliban. The result is an institution dedicated to peace whose members are too busy exchanging missiles to practise it. Like many international bodies before it, the Board of Peace demonstrates that peace, as ever, remains largely aspirational branding.

title: UK PM says British planes involved in 'defensive' Mideast actions- top developments
content: A massive cloud of smoke rose over Tehran following a daylight "preventive attack" by the United States and Israel, targeting military sites near Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei's offices. Loud blasts were heard as the US confirmed its participation in the strikes, hours after President Trump expressed dissatisfaction with nuclear talks and hinted at a "big decision"

title: Read memo that Sam Altman sent to employees hours before OpenAI signed deal with Pentagon
content: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman believes rival Anthropic is overreacting in its dispute with the US Department of War.  Altman stated OpenAI is working with the Pentagon on deploying AI in classified environments while maintaining safety, aiming to resolve industry deadlock.  He emphasized democracy over corporate power, seeking to de-escalate tensions.

title: Iran targets Qatar: Falling missile debris creates panic in Doha ‚Äì Watch
content: Panic erupted on the outskirts of Qatar's capital, Doha, as rocket debris fell, causing a large explosion. This incident occurred amidst retaliatory strikes by Iran targeting Israel and US facilities, following earlier attacks on Iran. The event highlights the growing risk of regional conflict spillover, with Qatar hosting a key US military base and having condemned the attack.

title: Farhan surpasses Virat Kohli, becomes highest ever to score this record
content: Sahibzada Farhan broke Virat Kohli‚Äôs record for most runs in a single T20 World Cup edition during Pakistan‚Äôs must-win Super 8 clash against Sri Lanka. Kohli had scored 319 runs in 2014. Farhan‚Äôs fluent knock powered Pakistan to 150 without loss alongside Fakhar Zaman, keeping their semifinal hopes alive with a strong start.

title: Trump 'bans' Anthropic, gives it same label that China‚Äôs Huawei has in US since year 2018
content: Anthropic is locked in a high-stakes standoff with the Trump administration after refusing to give the Pentagon unrestricted access to its Claude AI model. The company drew a line at mass surveillance and autonomous weapons. In response, Trump ordered a government-wide ban on Anthropic's technology, while Defence Secretary Pete Hegseth designated it a "supply chain risk"‚Äîa label typically reserved for foreign adversaries.

title: US-Israel strike Iran: Why Strait of Hormuz matters for oil prices - explained
content: Escalating US-Iran tensions, including strikes and retaliation, have reignited concerns over the vital Strait of Hormuz. This narrow passage, crucial for global oil trade, faces potential disruption, threatening to send crude prices soaring. India, heavily reliant on Middle Eastern oil, could face significant economic impact if the strait is closed.

title: 'Obama will attack': Trump‚Äôs old tweet resurfaces after US-Israeli strikes
content: Explosions rocked Tehran after US-Israeli strikes, reviving Donald Trump's 2013 tweet predicting Obama would attack Iran. Now, with "Operation Epic Fury" targeting Iran and Tehran retaliating, Trump's past accusations of using Iran for political gain echo.

title: 'It is a proud moment': PM Modi celebrates J&K's maiden Ranji triumph
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi congratulated Jammu & Kashmir on their maiden Ranji Trophy win, calling it a proud moment for the region. Cricket legends including Sachin Tendulkar, Jay Shah, Mohammad Kaif, Irfan Pathan, Aakash Chopra, Shikhar Dhawan, Harbhajan Singh, Yuvraj Singh and Suresh Raina praised the team‚Äôs grit, belief and historic achievement.

title: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy has a five-word reply for Jack Dorsey firing half of its staff
content: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy says he hasn't "really digested" Jack Dorsey's decision to lay off 4,000 employees ‚Äî nearly half of Block's workforce ‚Äî citing AI-driven efficiency gains. Jassy acknowledges that many jobs humans have done for decades won't need as many people going forward, but struck an optimistic note, saying new roles will emerge as they have with every past technology shift. He called it a "transition" period.

title: Watch: Israel releases first footage of strikes in Iran
content: Israel has released footage of its military strikes on Iran, marking a significant escalation. The coordinated operation with the US targeted Iranian military sites and infrastructure. Iran retaliated with missile launches towards Israel, prompting defensive actions and widespread airspace closures. Regional governments urge caution as tensions surge.

title: Iran strikes disrupt flights: Aviation min reviews situation; what IndiGo, Air India said
content: Several flights to the Middle East have been cancelled already. The Civil Aviation Minister conducted a detailed review of preparedness and response arrangements in coordination with all relevant stakeholders.

title: US-Iran tensions: Who are the men steering the storm in Middle East
content: The United States and Israel launched strikes against Iran, killing at least 40 people amid nuclear program negotiations and protests. President Trump warned Iranian forces to surrender or face death, while Supreme Leader Khamenei vowed resistance. The conflict escalates with key players like Benjamin Netanyahu and Reza Pahlavi involved.

title: Why Babar Azam is not playing do-or-die PAK vs SL Super 8 clash?
content: Pakistan dropped Babar Azam for their must-win Super 8 clash against Sri Lanka in the T20 World Cup 2026, citing poor form after he scored 91 runs in six matches. Skipper Salman Agha confirmed three changes at the toss. Pakistan must beat Sri Lanka by 64 runs to qualify after England topped the group and New Zealand sit second.

title: Toronto Maple Leafs face trade deadline pressure amid Auston Matthews scrutiny
content: As the NHL trade deadline approaches, the Toronto Maple Leafs are unsure about the direction of their roster and their captain, Auston Matthews; as rumors about NHL trades grow stronger, management needs to find a balance between being competitive in the short term and planning for the long term. This week is going to be very important for the NHL. Along with a lot of big news coming out. There are questions about player availability, locker room dynamics, and Matthews' future.

title: Iran attacks US military bases across Middle East in operation 'Truthful Promise 4'
content: The Revolutionary Guard said in a statement that in the first phase of the operation, named ‚ÄúTruthful Promise 4,‚Äù Iran‚Äôs military struck the command of the US 5th Fleet in Bahrain, as well as US bases in Qatar and the United Arab Emirates and military targets in Israel. However, the extent of the damage at the headquarters of the United States Fifth Fleet was not immediately clear. The base lies just southeast of central Manama, capital of the island nation of Bahrain.

title: 'Slit throats with axe': B'luru triple murder - Son kills parents, sister over marriage dispute
content: A man's fabricated missing-person report unraveled when his sister's phone rang from his pocket at the police station. Akshay BJ confessed to brutally murdering his parents and sister, burying them in a pit at their home. He claimed his uncle assisted in concealing the crime, but police suspect financial motives.

title: Watch: Rinku spotted at Kolkata airport hours after father's funeral
content: Rinku Singh rejoined India‚Äôs T20 World Cup squad in Kolkata hours after performing his father‚Äôs last rites in Aligarh. His father, Khanchand Singh, died of cancer at 60 in Greater Noida. Despite the loss, Rinku returned for the must-win clash against West Indies. Tributes poured in from Rajeev Shukla, Yuvraj Singh and Harbhajan Singh.

title: Lindholm powers Bruins surge as trade rumors swirl
content: As the NHL trade deadline approaches, rumors about trades are getting stronger. Hampus Lindholm is still a key part of the Boston Bruins' push. Boston has to make some important roster decisions now that they have beaten the Columbus Blue Jackets 4-2. Some of the players they might want to target are Robert Thomas and Brayden Schenn. The team's changing strategy also includes changes to the goaltending and defensive pairings.

title: 'If Hesson stays, Shadab will be captain': Shahid Afridi's big claim
content: Former captain Shahid Afridi believes Shadab Khan is the leading candidate to captain Pakistan if coach Mike Hesson remains. Afridi cited Shadab's strong rapport with Hesson from their time at Islamabad United as a key factor. He emphasized the need for Shadab to deliver consistent performances to justify the captaincy, a sentiment echoed by Shoaib Malik.

title: Operation 'Epic Fury': How Israel and US planned the strikes on Iran
content: In a surprise daylight operation dubbed 'Lion's Roar,' the US and Israel launched coordinated strikes near Iran's Supreme Leader's offices, signaling a potential end to diplomatic efforts on Tehran's nuclear program. President Trump vowed to dismantle Iran's missile industry and navy, emphasizing the elimination of imminent threats.

title: Israel‚ÄìIran military face-off: Who holds the edge in high-stakes showdown
content: Israel and Iran's escalating conflict sees coordinated strikes and retaliatory drone and missile launches, widening regional war fears. Military data reveals Iran's strength in manpower and missile volume, while Israel excels in technology, air superiority, and advanced missile defense. The balance between scale and sophistication will shape any prolonged confrontation.

title: Shoes outside! Silicon Valley startups adopt desi habit
content: A growing trend in San Francisco's tech scene sees employees leaving shoes outside office doors, a practice inspired by cultural norms. Startups like Cursor and Spur are adopting this policy, with leaders citing a desire to create a more comfortable, home-like atmosphere and practical benefits like cleanliness. This shift reflects the lingering influence of remote work habits on corporate culture.

title: 'Nahi hone wala': Sehwag tears apart Pakistan‚Äôs qualification scenario
content: Former India opener Virender Sehwag believes Pakistan will not reach the T20 World Cup 2026 semi-finals. He stated their qualification scenario is too difficult. Sehwag expressed doubt about Pakistan's ability to achieve the required large margins of victory. He suggested their batting lineup is not suited for such demanding chase targets.

title: Why US-Israel has attacked Iran now - explained in 5 points
content: The United States and Israel have launched coordinated strikes on Iran. This marks a significant escalation in their long-standing confrontation with Tehran. The offensive has pushed the region closer to a full-scale war. Air and sea attacks were reported near Tehran and across Iran. Retaliatory missile launches rippled through Israel and the Gulf.

title: US-Israel strike Iran: Tehran says ‚Äòtime to defend homeland‚Äô, hits back with missiles ‚Äì key points
content: United States and Israel on Saturday launched coordinated strikes on Iran. Explosions were reported across the country. Iran has retaliated with a barrage of missiles and drones targeting Israel. US military bases and facilities in the region were also attacked. Airspace across parts of the region has been shut. This marks a serious escalation in Middle East tensions.

title: Israel & US strike Iran: Khamenei's palace completely destroyed - where is Supreme Leader?
content: Multiple explosions rocked Tehran after Israel announced a pre-emptive military strike, aiming to reduce perceived threats. Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei has reportedly been moved to a secure, undisclosed location amid the escalating crisis. The United States is believed to have supported the operation, intensifying regional tensions.

title: 'Operation Epic Fury': How US, Israel encircled Iran before joint strikes
content: A new conflict has erupted in the Middle East. Israel and the United States have launched a joint operation named 'Epic Fury' against Iran. Strikes have begun near the offices of Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei. US President Donald Trump announced major combat operations. Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu stated the goal is to remove an existential threat.

title: Storm in Pakistan cricket: Mohsin Naqvi unhappy, Salman Agha set to be removed as captain
content: Pakistan's T20 captain Salman Ali Agha is set to be removed following the World Cup, irrespective of the team's performance. PCB chairman Mohsin Naqvi is reportedly unhappy with the campaign's trajectory. Senior players, including Babar Azam, may also see their T20 international careers conclude after the tournament.

title: 'They just wanted to practice evil': After attack, Trump says Iran can never have nuclear weapon
content: In a significant escalation, the US and Israel have launched "major combat operations" targeting Iran, aiming to neutralize "imminent threats." Strikes hit multiple locations nationwide, including near Supreme Leader Khamenei's office. This coordinated action, involving US forces, underscores rising regional tensions and Iran's nuclear program concerns.

title: How much prize money will J&K get for winning maiden Ranji title?
content: Jammu and Kashmir won their maiden Ranji Trophy title after drawing the final against Karnataka but securing a huge 291-run first-innings lead. They scored 584 in the first innings and extended their overall lead to 633 runs, with centuries from Qamran Iqbal and Sahil Lotra. As champions, J&K will receive Rs 5 crore in prize money.

title: Air India Express flight with 180 passengers stuck for 18 hours in Bengaluru
content: Passengers stranded at Bengaluru's Kempegowda International Airport protested after an Air India Express flight to Kathmandu was repeatedly diverted due to bad weather, leaving them waiting for more than 18 hours. About 180 travellers, including a Karnataka tour group, faced inadequate arrangements during diversions to Varanasi and Lucknow. The airline has offered hotel stays and options to reschedule.

title: First Taliban, now Iran: Why it could be a double whammy for Pakistan
content: Pakistan faces a dangerous two-front strategic squeeze as coordinated US-Israel strikes on Iran coincide with its military escalation with Afghanistan. This "double whammy" threatens to destabilize its security and economy, compounded by existing tensions with India and resurgent domestic militancy.

title: Speed, social media and showboating: A teenage menace on wheels
content: Fatal crashes involving young motorists, including minors, are a disturbing trend across India. Incidents in Goa, Delhi, Pune, and other cities highlight issues of excessive speed, underage drivers, and weak supervision. These tragedies underscore the urgent need for stricter enforcement and parental accountability to prevent future loss of life.

title: Jammu and Kashmir script history, win maiden Ranji Trophy title
content: Jammu and Kashmir achieved a historic Ranji Trophy triumph, their first ever, after a draw against Karnataka in the final.  Dominating the match, J&K secured the title on first-innings lead, thanks to stellar performances from Shubham Pundir and Auqib Nabi. Centuries from Qamran Iqbal and Sahil Lotra sealed their maiden championship.

title: Jerry sees Cowboys spending more in free agency
content: Cowboys owner and general manager Jerry Jones acknowledged Friday that he has let the fans down with Dallas' championship drought and has promised change -- starting with the team's approach to free agency.

title: Jokic angrily confronts Dort for 'unnecessary' foul
content: Thunder guard Lu Dort was called for a flagrant foul 2 and ejected from Friday night's game after appearing to trip Nuggets star Nikola Jokic, who called the play "an unnecessary move."

title: Celtics roll behind historic performance from floor
content: The Celtics posted one of the best offensive performances in league history on Friday night against the Nets.

title: FIFA to 'monitor developments' in Iran ahead of WC
content: FIFA will "monitor developments" in Iran following the outbreak of military action by the United States -- the co-hosts of this summer's men's World Cup -- against the Middle Eastern nation.

title: Michigan stops Illinois, wins outright Big Ten title
content: No. 3 Michigan defeated No. 10 Illinois 84-70 on Friday night and clinched the Big Ten regular-season title.

title: Miami (Ohio) rallies by WMU late, moves to 29-0
content: Trey Perry scored on a driving layup with a second remaining, and No. 21 Miami of Ohio rallied to beat Western Michigan 69-67 to extend its season-opening winning streak to 29 games.

title: Sources: New WNBPA proposal offers concessions
content: The Women's National Basketball Players Association submitted a new counterproposal to the WNBA on Friday evening with some concessions on revenue share and housing, a source told ESPN on Friday.

title: Ex-pitcher Serafini gets life in prison for murder
content: Former MLB pitcher Daniel Serafini was sentenced Friday to life in prison after being convicted of first-degree murder of his father-in-law, attempted murder of his mother-in-law and first-degree burglary.

title: üèà Best NFL combine workouts and draft risers
content: Top prospects such as David Bailey and Ohio State's linebacker duo starred. Here are our experts on the combine's top workouts.

content: Out of the WWE loop? Here's everything you need to know ahead of Saturday's Elimination Chamber in Chicago.

title: Where would Fernando Mendoza rank among QBs drafted in Round 1 over the past five years?
content: Let's rank every quarterback picked in Round 1 from 2021 to 2025 based on predraft evaluations -- and then slot in the expected No. 1 pick for 2026.

title: Six teams, five games, one title on the line: Your guide to the Unrivaled playoffs
content: The Phantom, Laces, Mist, Breeze, Rose and Vinyl have advanced to the Unrivaled playoffs, which open Saturday.

title: 'You're looking at a Ferrari': Introducing Konnor Griffin, MLB's next teenage superstar
content: The No. 1 prospect in baseball has a chance to join exclusive company on Opening Day -- if the Pirates are willing to let him.

title: One free agent each NFL team should sign: We found 32 perfect fits
content: Mike Evans to the Bills? Malik Willis to the Jets? Riq Woolen to the Jaguars? We found free agent fits for all 32 teams this offseason.

title: Bracketology: UNC inching closer but still outside of top 16
content: The Tar Heels are in third place in the ACC and have won 11 of their past 12 games, but they remain a No. 5 seed.

title: Premier League Power Rankings: Chelsea up, Liverpool down in ratings of all 20 teams
content: ESPN's Premier League Power Rankings return to look at all 20 teams: Chelsea are up, Liverpool are down, and Crystal Palace are on fire.

title: Why the East race is full of high stakes: 'Not a lot of honeymoons going on'
content: Tim Bontemps and Brian Windhorst survey the league to see who has the edge in the wide-open Eastern Conference.

title: NBA awards update: Why Cunningham, Wembanyama are the bets to make for MVP
content: Andre Snellings looks at the NBA awards races and explains which ones to bet on, and which to avoid entirely.

title: Ten years into his UFC career, Brandon Moreno still thinks he can be a three-time champion
content: One more run at the flyweight title would cap an already historic career for Mexican MMA pioneer Brandon Moreno.

title: WWE 'SmackDown' results: Logan Paul earns spot in Elimination Chamber match
content: New tag team champions were crowned and a new entrant was added to Elimination Chamber on "SmackDown."

title: Trade tier rankings: Which big names could bring a Stanley Cup?
content: The playoff races have restarted, with many teams seeking to bolster their rosters for a deep run this spring.

title: 'Attempting to mingle': Cameron Brink reveals how she met her fianc√© via email
content: Brinks now-fianc√© got in contact via unconventional means, eschewing social media direct messages and instead sending an email.

title: Stashing these injured players is a winning move
content: Eric Karabell serves up a list of currently injured players to keep on your radar for the last few rounds of your fantasy drafts.

title: Champions League round of 16 predictions: Real Madrid over Man City?
content: The path to the Champions League final is now mapped out, but who do we think makes it all the way to Budapest? Mark Ogden makes his picks.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man City, Man United in race to sign Anderson
content: Manchester City and Manchester United are set for a battle to sign Nottingham Forest's Elliot Anderson this summer. Transfer Talk has the latest.

title: Video: Man Yells "Side Ho Jaa" As Missile Falls From Sky In Qatar, Blows Up
content: Qatar, home to the region's largest US military base, Al Udeid, saw several missiles being fired at it by Iran on Saturday.

title: Flightradar24 Crashes As Users Track Flights Amid US, Israel Strikes On Iran
content: Several users received error messages while attempting to log in to the flight-tracking service Flightradar24 on Saturday.

title: Burj Khalifa Evacuated As Israel Iran Conflict Reaches Dubai's Doorstep
content: Dubai's Burj Khalifa, the world's tallest building, was evacuated after explosions were heard across the city as Iran launched a retaliatory attack targeting US military locations across the Gulf following joint American and Israeli strikes.

title: New Explosions In Dubai As Iran Attacks Abu Dhabi, Doha, Riyadh After US-Israel Strikes
content: Iran on Saturday attacked the UAE's Abu Dhabi and Dubai, Qatar's Doha, and Saudi Arabia's Riyadh hours after Israel and the US conducted joint strikes on Iran, plunging the Middle East into a new conflict.

title: Dubai International Airport, World's Busiest, Shuts Down Amid Iran Strikes
content: Dubai International Airport, the world's busiest international hub, has suspended all flight operations indefinitely following a wave of Iranian missile strikes across Gulf Arab states on Saturday.

title: US-Israel Attacks Iran LIVE Updates: 51 Students Die In Strike On Girls' School By US-Israel, Says Iran
content: US-Israel Attacks Iran LIVE Updates: Israel launched a daylight attack Saturday on Iran's capital, with a cloud of smoke rising from the city's downtown. The apparent strike happened near the offices of Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei.

title: 'Leave Now', 'Stay Calm': Dubai, Abu Dhabi Residents React To Iran Strikes
content: A video, reportedly from Abu Dhabi, shows people running to take cover with a smoke cloud rising in the air in the background.

title: As US-Israel Rain Fire On Iran, A 2013 Trump Post Returns To Haunt Him
content: Hours after the United States joined Israel in launching military strikes on Iran, a string of posts Donald Trump made on X more than a decade ago began circulating online.

title: First Visual Of US-Israel Strike On Iran Supreme Leader Khamenei's Compound
content: Iran's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei was the target of Saturday'sjoint Israeli-US strikes on Tehran, Israel's public broadcaster reported.

title: As Missiles Fly Across Middle East, Here's Who Stands With Whom
content: The United States and Israel have launched a major attack on Iran after what the Israeli military called months of "close and joint planning".

title: Iran Hit, Then Chain Reaction Across Gulf Capitals: Middle East's New Reality
content: The day began with sound before clarity -- sharp detonations reported across multiple capitals almost simultaneously. In Tehran, air defence systems were activated as Israeli aircraft struck Iranian military sites.

title: 1979 Embassy Attack, 'Argo': Latest Clash Not 1st Time US-Iran Ties Plummeted
content: As explosions rang through several Iran cities on Saturday morning, US President Donald Trump, while urging the Iranian people to "claim their freedom".

title: At Least 40 Killed At A School In Southern Iran In Israel-US Strikes
content: At least 40 people, including students, were killed at a girls' school on Saturday in Israeli-US airstrikes that were first reported in Tehran and then the rest of the country.

title: Tomahawks, Bunker-Busters, Ballistic Missiles: Weapons Driving Israel-Iran War
content: Israel's Operation Roaring Lion and the US-led Operation Epic Fury struck Iranian military and nuclear-linked sites, triggering a sweeping Iranian retaliation across the region.

title: Top Iran IRGC Commander Mohammad Pakpour Killed In Strikes: Israel
content: Mohammad Pakpour, commander of Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps, was killed in strikes on Saturday, claims Israel.

title: Missile Attack On US Navy Base In Bahrain As Chaos Grips Middle East
content: The United States' base in Bahrain has witnessed a missile attack as the Middle East plunges into a security nightmare after the US and Israel launched attacks on Iran.

title: Iran Launches "Barrage Of Missiles" After Israel-US Attack, Explosions In UAE, Qatar, Saudi
content: US-Israel Iran Attack News: The explosion came as tensions ran high between Iran and the United States over Tehran's nuclear program.

title: 910 Bullets, 15 Deaths: How Israel Coordinated Massacre Of Gaza Aid Workers In 2025
content: The report, released by independent research agency Forensic Architecture and audio investigation group Earshot, detailed the harrowing incident in which Israel killed fifteen aid workers.

title: Abu Dhabi Residents Receive Emergency Alerts, Advised To Take Shelter
content: Phones lit up as emergency alerts landed on Saturday afternoon amid explosions in Abu Dhabi, warning residents and expats of "potential missile threats".

content: Two high school students who had gone for swimming in a tank near Mulagund in Gadag district drowned on Saturday

content: The event will bring together leading scientists, policymakers, entrepreneurs, and industry pioneers to examine how seaweeds are reshaping food systems, climate mitigation strategies, sustainable aquaculture, and coastal livelihoods

content: A 1991-batch IAS officer of the Andhra Pradesh cadre, Sai Prasad began his career as Assistant Collector in Warangal and worked in several posts

title: Officials directed to complete Wadi ROB works within deadline, ensure proper implementation of Central schemes
content: Minister Patil has expressed displeasure over the inordinate delay in completing the railway overbridge near Balaram Chowk on National Highway 150 at Wadi

content: It addresses a long-standing challenge faced by the coir industry, where high salinity levels in coir pith often lead to rejection in foreign countries

title: Special court recommends dept inquiry against CBI IO
content: the special court recommended a departmental inquiry against the CBI's investigating officer (IO) while discharging all 23 accused in the liquor policy case . the court said the case was exposed as "demonstrably erroneous, economically illiterate and legally unsustainable"

title: Mysuru zoo summer camp in April and May
content: Students to get exposure to the basics of captive wild animal management, wildlife conservation, biodiversity, and animal behaviour at the annual camp

title: Assam BJP flags off ‚ÄòJan Ashirwad Yatra‚Äô ahead of Assembly elections
content: The party aims to reach out to at least 1 lakh people daily across 50 Assembly constituencies in the central and eastern part of the State

title: Chicken pox cases surging across districts in Kerala
content: Over 8,851 cases of chicken pox have been reported in the State this year so far. Paediatricians advise parents to vaccinate children who are staying away from home because of the highly contagious nature of the disease

title: HC raps State after tribal resident killed by wild elephant in Aralam; Chief Secretary, top officials summoned
content: Observing that the incident exposed ‚Äúclear lapses‚Äù in ensuring adequate safety measures for tribal residents in the Aralam farm and TRDM areas, the Bench in its order expressed dissatisfaction with the steps taken by the State machinery

title: Vision Mysuru-2050 summit from March 14
content: The initiative under the theme ‚ÄòInk Your Ideas‚Äô aims to chart a strategic roadmap for the city‚Äôs development over the next 25 years

title: People manhandle woman suspected to be child lifter in Belagavi
content: The crowd that saw the burkha-clad woman running with a crying child in her arms grew suspicious and caught her

title: Ajit Pawar plane crash: AAIB submits interim probe report, calls for stricter oversight of operations at smaller airfields
content: The report comes exactly a month after a Learjet-45 aircraft owned by VSR Ventures crashed at Baramati airfield on January 28

title: Kerala on its toes as Iran attacks U.S. bases in West Asia; panic calls following air traffic suspension
content: Kerala, which has over 30 lakh overseas diaspora members in the Gulf alone, has opened help desks to assist Keralites in Gulf countries following the conflict

title: Explosion at firecracker unit: Governor, Chief Minister express shock over loss of lives
content: The Chief Minister instructs the authorities to extend all assistance to the injured and to the next of kin of the deceased; Deputy Chief Minister Pawan Kalyan asks officials to maintain constant surveillance on firecracker units

title: TTD approves ‚Çπ5,456.26 crore budget for 2026-27 financial year
content: Temple ‚Äòhundi‚Äô collection tops the revenue chart with an estimated income of ‚Çπ1,880 crore, an increase of ‚Çπ142 crore more than that of the 2025-26 fiscal

title: Inquiry ordered into fake abortion registrations in tribal villages of Eluru district
content: More than 70 suspected bogus entries detected after ITDA report flags 281 abortions in nine months; Women‚Äôs Commission cites lapses in mandatory pregnancy tests and issuance of MCP cards

title: Modi's Israel visit 'ill-timed', creates perception of political endorsement of military action: Congress

title: Centre‚Äôs revenue focus has shifted from selling PSUs to earning more from them, data shows
content: By removing a separate ‚Äòdisinvestment‚Äô heading in Budget documents and doubling down on asset monetisation, govt policy has shifted from simply exiting doing business

title: Matt Holliday's Stillwater estate listed for $12 million
content: a Stillwater, Oklahoma, home that once belonged to an MLB champion and seven-time All-Star is on the market at $12 million . the home features sports-related amenities such as a professionally lit baseball field in the front yard, a putting green in the backyard, and a $2 million, two-level swimming pool . indoor batting cages, pickleball and basketball courts reside in a detached $150,000 guest home on the property .

title: Preview, key stats to know for ABC Saturday: Penguins-Rangers, Bruins-Flyers
content: the 2026 Olympic men's hockey tournament is complete . the Pittsburgh Penguins face off against the new york Rangers . in the second game, the Boston Bruins take on the Philadelphia Flyers in the playoffs . they will have Rasmus Ristolainen, Dan Vladar and Travis Sanheim .

title: Weekend predictions: Arsenal, Bayern title bids on the line?
content: arsenal host manchester city in the premier league on saturday . arsenal are back at the Emirates for another London derby and another huge game in their quest for a long-overdue title . aaron ramsey and samuel eto'o are all in the top five . click here for more arsenal news .

title: How the top QB signings will fit in 2026
content: the top 2026 recruits at each position could fit at their new schools . the perfect harmony between skill and scheme can lead to production and wins on the field . this is the most high-profile prospect Houston has signed in the modern era .

title: Power Rankings: Stakes are high for UCLA, two teams rejoin the list
content: the Bruins will be just the fourth program to finish with a perfect regular season in the Big Ten women's college basketball . the last to do it was Maryland in 2015, the season the Terps joined the big Ten and advanced to the final Four for the second year in a row .

title: The game that will define the 2026 season for every power-conference team
content: the season-defining game will be for all 68 power-conference teams in 2026 . peruse BC's schedule given last year's struggles, and it's tough to find many wins . the Eagles open on the road at Cincinnati, then play FCS Maine .

title: Men's Bracketology watch guide: How Kansas-Arizona, Virginia-Duke could impact 1-seeds
content: bracketologist Joe Lunardi is tracking every relevant game every day . he projects the teams that could have their names called on selection Sunday (March 15) a team's projected field of 68 for the 2026 tournament will have plenty of movement .

title: NFL Players Association releases 2026 team report cards
content: ESPN obtained the results of the NFL Players Association's 2026 report cards . it grades franchises from A-plus to F-minus on everything from ownership to treatment of families . all players who were on a 2025 roster at the time of the survey were eligible to participate .

title: NHL Power Rankings: New 1-32 poll, over/under bet for each team
content: the 2026 Olympic ice hockey tournament is complete . all players have returned to their teams, some to the ice, others to injured reserve . a new 1-32 poll is based on the games through Wednesday . it's time to take the temperature with another set of Power Rankings .

title: Does anyone beat Ohtani? Buster Olney ranks the top 10 designated hitters
content: coach Buster Olney ranked the best of the best at designated hitters . the goal of this exercise is to identify the best players for the 2026 season, not who might be best in five years or over their career . we rolled out a position per day over two weeks .
